article.title: An International Mass Spectral Search System (MSSS). V. A status Report
article.author: Heller, Rachelle S.Milne, G. W. A.Feldmann, Richard J.Heller, Stephen R.
article.text: The status of MSSS is described.. Problems and experiences that have been encountered in three years of commmercial operation of this system are reported and discussed..
